title: Olansia
description: Fiction just became reality.The world had forgotten magic existed. Then, magic returns to the world and the government immediately begins rounding up those with powers. Celwyn’s father takes her to his homeland, Olansia, but the shifters attempt to kill her, threatened by her being the first therianthrope in hundreds of years.She’s saved by a stranger and taken to his fortress where she wakes to find beings with horns, demons, or Enki’l as they call themselves.Can she trust this Enki’l? Should she return to the shifters despite their attempted murder?
author: Catherine  Banks
